description: This file defines an asynchronous FastAPI router for handling AG-UI compatible interactions with either an Agent or a Team in the Agno framework. It includes functions to run agents or teams, stream responses, and set up API endpoints.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an Agent with provided input, streaming AG-UI formatted events, handling errors.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Asynchronously runs a Team with provided input, streaming AG-UI formatted events, handling errors.

methods.name: get_async_agui_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter configured for AG-UI interactions with either an Agent or a Team.
